message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, even at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this lower price?
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm looking for a bit more than that. How about $12,500? This is a significant discount from my original offer and reflects the true value of this product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet the price of $12,500. Could we perhaps agree on $11,000?
